entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 19 January 2023
